Summary: to the east low on the horizen. one light then a space and 6 or 7 lights in a row
divs: Sighting Details 5.05 am looking to the east low on the horizen. bright lights , one then a space and 6or 7 lights flashing.left to right. staying in the same place. a lot brighter than any star. cloudy night, no stars out. moon was low. there was a little light from thr moon.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Lapeer
